overview:
Marcel’s experience includes more than 13 years in the TMT market, either as executive, consultant or board member. All these roles have allowed him to accumulate a very big multinationals like Vodafone to some start ups.

Ex member of the Executive Committee of Cluster Consulting, latterly DiamondCluster, since its foundation in 1993 where Marcel advised CEO’s and CMO’s of several wireless operators all over the world.

Since 2003 Marcel is also a Board Member of Fractus, a telecomms company, backed among others by 3i and Apax. He is also Board Member of Southwing, Center Post and the Node Company, all of them Nauta Tech Invest I portfolio companies.
